item.title: Mary Kay LumiVie™ Black Mask Sheet
item.description: Description LumiVie™ Skin Care with the power of black pearl Helps deliver multifunctional benefits: Brightening Energizing Moisturization* Even skin tone Excludes LumiVie™ Foaming Cleanser which was not tested for moisturizing properties. The power of black pearl is infused into every LumiVie™ product to deliver an elevated brightening of the skin experience. From the mysterious beauty of the black pearl comes immaculately improved skin brightness. Precious and rare, the black pearl has long symbolized unique beauty.

item.title: Mary Kay LumiVie™ Intensive Serum
item.description: Description From the mysterious beauty of the black pearl comes immaculately bright skin. Precious and rare, the black pearl has long symbolized unique beauty. Helps deliver multifunctional benefits: Brightening Energizing Moisturization Overview Black pearl extract is shown to impact processes* that protect and brighten skin, and it also helps boost skin energy*. item.title: Mary Kay Naturally™ Exfoliating Powder
item.description: Description This creamy cleanser helps remove dirt to leave skin feeling refreshed, hydrated and comforted. After use, skin looks healthy and feels nourished and soothed. Mary Kay Naturally® products are: Paraben free Phthalate free Synthetic fragrance free Synthetic dye free SLS/SLES free The Mary Kay Naturally® Exfoliating Powder is also free of talc, surfactants, silicone, mineral oil, alcohol and any ingredients that have been genetically modified. 99.49% Natural Origin*

item.title: Mary Kay Skinvigorate Next Gen Set
Mary Kay Skinvigorate Sonic Facial Massage Head
Mary Kay Youthfinity® Face Cream
item.description: Description YOUTHFINITY® is powered by the exclusive Infinite Rose Complex to release you free from stressors that attack your beauty inside and out. The Complex helps your skin resist damage, helps rejuvenate matrix proteins and helps reveal youthful vitality. Overview INFINITE ROSE COMPLEX* contains Alpen Rose, Evening Primrose, and Infinite Tripeptide to release your skin free from stressors that attack your beauty inside and out. The magnificent ingredients can help protect skin from external irritants.

item.title: Mary Kay Youthfinity® Oil
item.description: Description The Facial Oil is powered by a 24-karat liquid-gold peptide for enhanced firmness and luxurious luminosity. A 24-karat liquid-gold peptide boosts collagen production* for enhanced firmness. The luxurious oil leaves skin petal-soft and exquisitely illuminated. Evening primrose and alpine rose extracts provide age-fighting antioxidant protection.* Overview INFINITE ROSE COMPLEX* contains Alpen Rose, Evening Primrose, and Infinite Tripeptide to release your skin free from stressors that attack your beauty inside and out.

item.title: Mary Kay Youthfinity® Serum
item.description: Description Volu-Firm® Advanced Lifting Serum concentrates its action by reclaiming your triangle of youth. This triangle – full cheeks, a defined jawline, a taut neck – embodies youthfulness. But as skin ages, this area can become compromised. The cheeks can appear hollow. The jawline can start to sag. And crepiness can begin to show on the neck. Your best defense is Volu-Firm® Advanced Lifting Serum. Overview INFINITE ROSE COMPLEX* contains Alpen Rose, Evening Primrose, and Infinite Tripeptide to release your skin free from stressors that attack your beauty inside and out.
